attributes.action: The government should force sia body to introduce law for sia contractors to pay its employees minimum wage of 12p/h
attributes.additional_details: I work in central London.I pay £270 per month in fares £800 per month in rent and £380 a month for basic living (bill,food,clothes)At a rate of £7.50. i cannot keep up with the costs in London unless i work 7days a week 12 hours a day.VAT is going up and rent is going up but our wages are frozen.We need a decent wage to match the difficult and very important job we do of looking after buildings 24 hours a day 7 days a week.
